summary: The bill, the Local Communities & Bird Habitat Stewardship Act of 2025, directs the Secretary of the Interior to establish the Urban Bird Treaty Program. This program aims to conserve birds and their habitats in urban areas through habitat protection, hazard reduction, community engagement, and providing grants. It addresses declining bird populations, promotes birdwatching's economic benefits, and seeks to mitigate wildlife-borne disease spread. The bill authorizes $1,000,000 annually from 2026-2032 to carry out the act.
